summary: The first ever feature-length film to capture the essence, drama and unique spectacle of the famed 26.2-mile race, the production features five runners - three amateurs and two elites - as ... See full summary »
cast: Dick Beardsley|Ryan Bradley|Leah Caille|Deena Kastor|Jerry Meyers|Daniel Njenga|Lori O'Connor|Paula Radcliffe|Bill Rodgers|Frank Shorter|Kathrine Switzer
title: Spirit of the Marathon
